acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle POJOs with private constructors only
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandlePojosWithPrivateOnlyConstructors

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.pdm33.PrivateOnlyConstructorPojo
Then the Object PrivateOnlyPojo ( firstName = CwwJ8pJPyr intField = -2124975327 ) should not be null
Then the String field CwwJ8pJPyr cannot be null or empty
Then the int field should not be zero
